hero.title: We are the Network of Users of Composting Toilets
hero.description: We promote respect for water, land, and LIFE in general, closing natural cycles. Let's stop polluting and instead generate compost instead of black waters!
hero.platformDescription: This platform is a tool to share how our ecological toilets work and where they are located, as well as sharing experiences.

whatIs.title: What are dry toilets?
whatIs.content: Dry toilets are sanitation systems that do not use water to treat human waste. They rely on natural composting and decomposition methods.

howWorks.title: How dry toilets work
howWorks.content: Solid and liquid waste is separated into two different containers. Solids are covered with dry materials to promote composting.

benefits.title: Benefits of dry toilets
list: Ease of installation in remote areas

maintenance.title: Maintenance of dry toilets
maintenance.content: It is important to follow specific guidelines for the safe and proper disposal of waste.

differences.title: Differences between dry toilets and traditional toilets
differences.content: Dry toilets eliminate the need for water to transport waste, which brings environmental advantages.
